body:
Hello! Today I tried to create a simple outdoor airflow analysis with Butterfly and received an error while trying to blockmesh. The error message is as follows: SET DOCKER_TLS_VERIFY=1&SET DOCKER_HOST=tcp://192.168.99.100:2376&SET DOCKER_CERT_PATH=C:\Users\akiwya\.docker\machine\machines\default&SET DOCKER_MACHINE_NAME=default&docker exec -i 4c9bb2f7444b pgrep snappyHexMesh

Butterfly is running blockMesh. PID: 1837

new cannot satisfy memory request.

**Traceback:**
**line 51, in script** I don't really have any knowledge in CFD simulation and only watched the tutorials and managed to get the sample files to work. So this time, I replaced the starting geometry my building which is a curve building, I wonder if that is the issue that caused this problem. Can anyone enlighten me on the issue? Warm regards, Annie
topic: Butterfly Error - Cannot satisfy memory request
